text: Jalan Pekeliling 4, Federal Route 343, is a federal road in the Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA), Malaysia. The Kilometre Zero is located at KLIA Outer Ring Road junctions. At most sections, the Federal Route 343 was built under the JKR R5 road standard, allowing maximum speed limit of up to 90 km/h. ==List of junctions== {|class="wikitable" |- !km||Exit||Junctions||To||Remarks |- | 0 || ||KLIA Outer Ring Road|| KLIA Outer Ring Road North Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) (Main terminal and LCCT) Kuala Lumpur Banting Sepang Sepang International Circuit South Cargo terminal||T-junctions |- |style="width:600px" colspan="6" style="text- align:center; background:green;"|Malaysian Ministry of Agriculture Quarantine Complex Restricted area |- | || ||Malaysian Ministry of Agriculture Quarantine Complex||Custom and Excise Depot Centre (Customs Detention Centre) Veterinary Centre FAMA Complex Fisheries Quarantine Centre||Restricted area |} ==References== Category:Malaysian Federal Roads Category:Kuala Lumpur International Airport Category:Roads in Selangor
title: Jalan Pekeliling 4
